definition: (name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
Ürümqi or Urumqi prefecture level city and capital of Xinjiang Uighur autonomous region 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区 in west China
alternative name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
Nicolas Sarkozy (1955-), French UMP politician, President 2007-2012
Qiqihar prefecture level city in Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China
Qiqihar prefecture level city in Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China

sentences.english: Have I served you everything by now?
I have no doubts whatsoever on the line-up I'll field at the Stadio Franchi.
sentences.chinese: 对于谁会首发出现在法兰齐球场上，我没有疑问。

sentences.english: Jia small gun and others design captures the mole, turned out to be a blacksmith.
sentences.chinese: 贾小枪等人设计抓住了内奸，原来是齐铁匠。

sentences.english: It can accomodate 6 people and has all the amenities of a conventional hotel room.
sentences.chinese: 它有齐传统酒店房间的一切设施，并可容纳6人。

sentences.english: An amalgan is a solution of a metal in liquid Hg.
sentences.chinese: 汞齐是金属在液态汞中的溶液。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for determination AZT in AZT Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立齐多夫定胶囊中AZT的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: And the soldiers led him away into the hall, called Praetorium; and they call together the whole band.
sentences.chinese: 兵丁把耶稣带进衙门院里，叫齐了全营的兵。

sentences.english: We hope that we can come out of the Stadio Franchi with our heads held high.
sentences.chinese: 我们期望我们可以高昂着头走出法兰齐体育场。

sentences.english: Johann Ernst Elias Bessler is born in or around the village of Zittau, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 约翰恩斯特埃利亚斯老婆是出生或村周围齐，德国。

sentences.english: Sir, all your dishes are served, please enjoy your meal.
sentences.chinese: 先生，您点的菜都上齐了，请慢用。
“RL瑞龙”，压花闪闪发光的金属单管齐马镫扣。

sentences.english: Our class has perfect attendance today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们班同学全到齐了。

sentences.english: His arm was lopped off at the elbow.
sentences.chinese: 他的胳膊齐肘部给截断了。

sentences.english: I still have a wealth of stuff to buy before going abroad in these two days.
sentences.chinese: 出国还有很多东西没有买，这两天得买齐了。

sentences.english: All the teachers have already arrived.
There are special reasons why Qi Liang Fu was not included in Wenxuan.
sentences.chinese: 但《文选》不录齐梁赋，却有其特殊原因。

definition: surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]

surname Wei/name of vassal state of Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States/Wei state, founded by Cao Cao 曹操[Cao2 Cao1], one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty/the Wei dynasty 221-265/Wei prefecture and Wei county at different historical periods
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
distinct/clear/orderly/pain/suffering/deciduous bush used in Chinese medicine (genus Vitex)/punishment cane (old)
surname Chu/abbr. for Hubei 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] and Hunan 湖南省[Hu2 nan2 Sheng3] provinces together/Chinese kingdom during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (722-221 BC)
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
